text: Emile Linus Alfred Wijntuin (22 September 1924 – 7 May 2020) was a Surinamese politician. He was the Chairman of the National Assembly of Suriname from 1975 until the aftermath of the 1980 Surinamese coup d'état."The Year of the Sergeants" by Edward Dew in the Caribbean Review Wijntuin was a member of the Progressive Surinamese People's Party. He was born in the Coronie District. He was the Chairman of the Staten of Suriname from 1973 to 1975. Wijntuin died on 7 May 2020 at the age of 95. == References == Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Surinamese politicians Category:Coronie District
title: Emile Wijntuin
